Test Case: Verify if the API key is correct and legal
Verify if the API call is correct
Verify if no null values are passed in the API Call. Positive
Verify if all the required parameters passed are of the correct data type
Verify if the POST request is empty
Verify if Updates in the API are handled properly
Verify if the response is handled correctly
Verify if the response from the API is parsed correctly
Verify if the API method called is correct
Verify if the API method called has the correct datatypes passed to the required parameters
Either optional parameters are not passed at all or if they are passed
Type of Test Case (Positive / Negative): then their respective datatypes are correct

Test Case: Verify the response of the HTTP satus codes are handled
Verify the handling of API Error Codes
Verify if the response payload is invalid
Verify if wrong error codes are present
Verify the handling of exceptions during API calls
Verify if invalid operations have been done on API results
